body_html:
Thanks for your input @wagonhelm ! Unfortunately that's not something that we'll do at this point.

You can use http://stackoverflow.com/questions/34199233/how-to-prevent-tensorflow-from-allocating-the-totality-of-a-gpu-memory (see both answers).

Thanks for your input @wagonhelm ! Unfortunately that's not something that we'll do at this point.

You can use http://stackoverflow.com/questions/34199233/how-to-prevent-tensorflow-from-allocating-the-totality-of-a-gpu-memory (see both answers).
